title: Miyagino Football Stadium
text:
is a <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="stadium">stadium</a> in <a href="Sendai">Sendai</a>, <a href="Miyagi%20Prefecture">Miyagi</a>, <a href="Japan">Japan</a>.
It hosted the <a href="1951%20Emperor%27s%20Cup">1951 Emperor's Cup</a> and <a href="1951%20Emperor%27s%20Cup%20Final">final</a> game between <a href="Keio%20BRB">Keio BRB</a> and <a href="Osaka%20Club">Osaka Club</a> was played there on May 27, 1951.
